螒字的基本解释

螒
hàn
古书上说的一种虫。

螒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《廣韻》侯旰切，去翰，匣。］
虫名。纺织娘。

螒字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螒； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1093第08
【唐韻】侯旰切，音翰。【爾雅·釋蟲】螒，天雞。【註】小蟲，黑身赤頭。一名莎雞，一名樗雞。

螒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
螒字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhe
Basic explanation of words
Zhe
hàn
A kind of insect mentioned in ancient books.
Zhe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Guang Yun" Hou Jiqie, go to Han, Xia. ]
Insect name. The textile mother.
Zhe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螒; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1093 Page 08
【Tang Yun】Hou Jiqie, Yinhan. 【Erya·Release insects】Zhe, Tianji. [Note] The bug has a black body and a naked head. One Shaji, one Barnyard Chicken.
